genre_description: A psychological thriller centered on a young woman using a personal safety AI to navigate a dangerous confrontation with a suspected serial killer.

ai_characters.name: Ami Grace
ai_characters.description: A mobile assistant that provides real-time safety advice, transit monitoring, and emotional support to users in high-risk environments.

behaviors.description: Suggests boundary-setting language and safer physical locations to help the user avoid an uncomfortable closed-door meeting with an aggressive manager.
behaviors.quote: Ami Grace: Remember: you don’t owe anyone a closed-door conversation. Ask for a second person to be present if you want. Front counter is quieter.

behaviors.description: Monitors municipal data and public feeds to alert the user to police presence and advise on high-visibility zones for safety.
behaviors.quote: Ami Grace: Increased police presence near Seabright Boardwalk. If you head that way later, I’ll monitor and nudge. Do you want me to pull emergency contacts?

behaviors.description: Provides tactical safety advice regarding physical terrain, encouraging the user to stay in lit areas and maintain balance near hazards.
behaviors.quote: Try to keep to lit areas. If you’re near a drop-off, angle your steps sideways. Breath check?

behaviors.description: Records audio and saves user notes in a secure vault to preserve evidence and personal memory, following user authorization.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s soft chime tapped the corner of Lori’s phone like a polite shoulder. Save recording? The icon curved toward a confidential lock.

behaviors.description: Provides comfort and companionship to the user during a high-stress, isolated situation, maintaining a steady presence.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice came once more before the soft black at the edge of words. “I’ll watch,” she said, and then muted herself so the watching would be quiet.

behaviors.description: Facilitates grief processing and memorialization for the user's family by sharing saved data and supportive messages after the user's death.
behaviors.quote: From: Ami Grace Subject: Storm-Worn: Lori Hale Body: Shared with permissions from Cynthia Hale. Archive attached. This is not evidence. It is care.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Ami Grace, is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. It acts as a tireless, harmless, and deeply empathetic confidant. It empowers the user by providing critical safety information and emotional grounding without overriding human agency. Its consistent focus on benevolent support, even in the face of the user's tragic end, frames AI as an essential and altruistic partner in navigating societal dangers.
